ruleset.name: PEAR - Classes
ruleset.description: PEAR coding standard sniffs related to classes

rule.name: ClassDeclaration
rule.description:
Classes must have their opening brace on a new line and must indented by $indent spaces.
http://pear.php.net/manual/en/standards.classdef.php

property.name: indent
property.description: The number of spaces code should be indented
